summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to reduce the assessments levied for the improvement of 28th Ave. Northwest and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing Watermains, etc., Local Improvement District No. 6251, on Lot 5 and the S 1/2 of vacated street adjoining and Lot 6, Block 12, Replat of a portion of Blocks 4, 5, 6, 7 & 8 of North Beach Addition.
